PHRASE.LANG: This horseshoe is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Lucky Award" for winning 10 races in a row betting 3 or more coins on the winner. [#Legal]

Ce fer à cheval est une récompense de "A Day At The Races" article course de chevaux. C'est le "Lucky Award" pour avoir remporté 10 courses d'affilée paris 3 ou plusieurs pièces de monnaie sur le vainqueur. [#Legal]
This horseshoe is a reward from the "A Day At The Races" horse race item. It is the "Lucky Award" for winning 10 races in a row betting 3 or more coins on the winner. [#Legal]
